trans-unit.target:
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SEQ_01<tab>Softknox has told you about Rival Wings, a new type of war game incorporating goblin-made machina. If the thought of such fighty-play gives you heartthumps, you can learn more from Softknox...or dive straight into the action.
※Astragalos can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SOFTKNOX_000_000<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Softknox comes to wolf place, learns that uplanders have many heartthumps for fighty-play.

TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SOFTKNOX_000_001<tab>Softknox sees chance for busydeal. Offers gobbie hand-lending for uplanders to have <var 1A 02 /var>better<var 1A 01 /var> fighty-play. Crunch bone and smash steel muchly!
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SOFTKNOX_000_002<tab>Now new fighty-play is born, name of “Rival Wings”! Machina of gobmake help uplanders make much mayhem together!
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SOFTKNOX_000_003<tab>If uplander wishes to fill braincase with knowings of Rival Wings, Softknox happy to give many tongueflaps!
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SOFTKNOX_000_050<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Gobbies make new fighty-play to give many heartthumps. Does uplander have strong enough bladder to try?
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must meet the following requirements:
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>※ You must be at least level 30 with a Disciple of War or Magic.
TEXT_COMALL002_03007_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>※ You must be affiliated with a Grand Company and have unlocked the Feast.
